urlText: Central Station: Changes to Platform 16 and 17
content:
From 18 May 2020 there will be changes to Platforms 16 and 17 at Central Station due to Sydney Metro construction works.

Hoarding for the Central Walk excavation work will move from the middle of the platform to the southern end of the platform. Temporary concrete ramps will be built to connect the existing platform floor surface and the new concrete floor surface areas.

For your safety, please move carefully along the platform and follow directions from staff.

If you are travelling to Central Station and require assistance to alight from Platforms 16 and 17, please board via the front door of the fourth train carriage.

For more information about the Sydney Metro construction works, visit sydneymetro.info.
subtitle: Central Station: Changes to Platform 16 and 17

urlText: Green Square lift outage - between concourse and street level
content:
Due to maintenance, the lift between the concourse and street level is temporarily out of service.

The lift is expected to be out of service until 9 September.

If you require a lift or easy access you may wish to consider using Central as an alternative.

For further assistance please see station staff or call 8337 8400.
subtitle: Green Square lift outage - between concourse and street level

urlText: St Marys Station lift temporarily unavailable
content:
From Sunday 14 June to Sunday 16 August 2020 the lift between the concourse and platforms 1 and 2 will be temporarily unavailable due to scheduled upgrade works.

If you require a lift or easy access please change at Mount Druitt or Werrington station to get to your destination.

For further assistance, please see station staff or call 9851 7525.
subtitle: St Marys Station lift temporarily unavailable

properties.speechText: From Sunday 14 June to Sunday 16 August 20-20 the lift between the concourse and platforms 1 and 2 will be temporarily unavailable due to scheduled upgrade works.

urlText: Central Station: Stairs, Lift, Escalators and Suburban Tunnel temporary closure
content:
From midnight Saturday 18 July to 4am Monday 20 July 2020 - the stairs, escalators and lift between the Grand Concourse and Northern Concourse at Central Station will be closed for Sydney Metro construction works. The Suburban Tunnel will also be closed during this period.

Alternative stairs, escalators and lift are available outside the Opal gates. Please follow the signs and staff directions. If you need assistance, see station staff.

For more information about the Sydney Metro construction works visit sydneymetro.info.
subtitle: Central Station: Stairs, Lift, Escalators and Suburban Tunnel temporary closure

urlText: Central Station: Southern Tunnel temporary closure
content:
The Southern Tunnel at Central Station is currently closed for Sydney Metro works.

Please use the Suburban Tunnel for access to Platforms 4 to 23 or travel via the Northern Concourse.
subtitle: Central Station: Southern Tunnel temporary closure
